pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
PROJECT: KEL-GOR LTD. NEW SHOP 1411 PLANK RD SARNIA, ONTARIO
SHEET NO: S100
DATE: FEB 10, 2025
TITLE: STRUCTURAL SPECIFICATIONS & DRAWING LIST
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES
1. UNLESS SHOWN OTHERWISE ON THE DRAWINGS, THE FOLLOWING NOTES SHALL GOVERN.
2. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL CHECK AND VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS AT THE SITE AND REPORT ANY DISCREPANCIES TO THE ENGINEER BEFORE PROCEEDING WITH THE WORK.
3. ALL CONSTRUCTION IS TO COMPLY WITH THE ONTARIO BUILDING CODE AND ALL OTHER APPLICABLE CODES AND REGULATIONS.
4. THE ENGINEER SHALL BE NOTIFIED IMMEDIATELY IF ANY CONDITIONS ARE ENCOUNTERED WHICH VARY FROM THE DRAWINGS OR SPECIFICATIONS.
5. ALL MATERIALS AND WORKMANSHIP SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE LATEST EDITIONS OF THE APPLICABLE CODES AND STANDARDS.
6. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY BRACING AND SHORING REQUIRED TO MAINTAIN THE STABILITY OF THE STRUCTURE DURING CONSTRUCTION.
7. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION OF ALL TEMPORARY WORKS REQUIRED FOR THE EXECUTION OF THE PROJECT.
8. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY SAFETY MEASURES TO PROTECT THE PUBLIC AND WORKERS DURING CONSTRUCTION.
9. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE PROTECTION OF ALL EXISTING SERVICES AND STRUCTURES DURING CONSTRUCTION.
10. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE COORDINATION OF ALL TRADES AND SUBCONTRACTORS.
11. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY ACCESS AND FACILITIES FOR THE INSPECTION OF THE WORK BY THE ENGINEER.
12. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY DOCUMENTATION AND CERTIFICATIONS REQUIRED BY THE ENGINEER.
13. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE A COMPLETE SET OF AS-BUILT DRAWINGS UPON COMPLETION OF THE PROJECT.
14. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY WARRANTIES AND GUARANTEES REQUIRED BY THE ENGINEER.
15. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY MAINTENANCE MANUALS AND INSTRUCTIONS REQUIRED BY THE ENGINEER.
16. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TRAINING REQUIRED BY THE ENGINEER.
17. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY TESTING AND COMMISSIONING REQUIRED BY THE ENGINEER.
18. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE ALL NECESSARY INSURANCE REQUIRED BY THE ENGINEER....
